content: Well it seems I've fixed the problem so far! I've spoken to 2 tech support individuals over the past days. Sadly the original person gave the wrong outgoing server information causing me a day. The second tech gave me the correct outgoing server but then gave me a new WRONG incoming server!!. As I was able to send emails but not receive I took it upon myself to try the original incoming server information, thankfully. Mybe this might help someone else. Kind regards WS new incoming server pop.bellaliant.net port 110
